channel.title: Hh about cache
channel.description:
hello guys, im using deathlypvpz source and the owner of the cache have deleted it from dropbox so now no one can play but i got the cache and i just want to upload it to dropbox but i dont know why it dosent work i have ziped it and upload it
i have did this right click on the cache and click add to archive (mine in a different language). [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/290wxlx.png[/img] then i just changed it to zip i didnt do anything else. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/20u2y5i.png[/img] after that it give me this [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28wpapw.png[/img] next i go to dropbox.com [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ea1ic7.png[/img] and it show like this [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/5eczud.png[/img] after that i click at public and it give me this [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2vhu7tz.png[/img] then i clicked at upload [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/15697ia.png[/img] and it give me this i click "choose files" [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/27y8w9h.png[/img] after that i choosed the cache that it is on winrar like this [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/zl2e7s.png[/img] and it is uploading [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mizbro.png[/img] after it done it give me this link [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2s0n0iv.png[/img] than i go to the client and click at CacheDownloader.java [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/207p3ky.png[/img] and past the link there like this [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/210exrr.png[/img] after that i compiled then run the server and it worked good i mean it downloaded like this [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/10ena5c.png[/img] but when it reach 100 it give me this [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1zm2hef.png[/img] and when i go to c:drive where it should be (the cache) [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/an0mde.png[/img] i click at it it show like this [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2untwm9.png[/img] and when i click at it the ".DeathlypvpzCv2.2" the files are in it
and when i copy them and paste them where they should be it works fine so how to make it the files download in "local disk (c:)" inside the .DeathlypvpzCv2.2 not inside .DeathlypvpzCv2.2 and again inside .DeathlypvpzCv2.2 please help me with this i spent 2 hours writing this?

item.title: Hh about cache
item.dc:creator: @Iyal1234 Iyal1234
item.description:
@Iyal1234 wrote:

hello guys, im using deathlypvpz source and the owner of the cache have deleted it from dropbox so now no one can play
but i got the cache and i just want to upload it to dropbox but i dont know why it dosent work i have ziped it and upload it

i have did this right click on the cache and click add to archive (mine in a different language).

290wxlx.png332×513

then i just changed it to zip i didnt do anything else.

after that it give me this

next i go to dropbox.com

and it show like this

after that i click at public and it give me this

then i clicked at upload

and it give me this i click “choose files”
27y8w9h.png699×211

after that i choosed the cache that it is on winrar like this
zl2e7s.png1263×421

and it is uploading
mizbro.png700×227

after it done it give me this link
2s0n0iv.png700×244

than i go to the client and click at CacheDownloader.java

and past the link there like this
210exrr.png942×319

after that i compiled then run the server and it worked good i mean it downloaded like this
10ena5c.png784×544

but when it reach 100 it give me this
1zm2hef.png1396×530

and when i go to c:drive where it should be (the cache)

i click at it it show like this

and when i click at it the “.DeathlypvpzCv2.2” the files are in it

and when i copy them and paste them where they should be it works fine so how to make it the files download in “local disk (c:)” inside the .DeathlypvpzCv2.2
not inside .DeathlypvpzCv2.2 and again inside .DeathlypvpzCv2.2 please help me with this i spent 2 hours writing this?

Read full topic
